The term "chintzy" originates from "chintz," a type of printed cotton fabric that became popular in Europe in the 17th century. Chintz was originally a high-quality, imported fabric from India, featuring intricate floral patterns. However, as mass production and cheaper imitations became widespread, the term "chintzy" evolved to describe something that is gaudy, cheap, or of poor quality. Over time, "chintzy" has come to refer more generally to anything that appears to be of low quality or is perceived as being done in a stingy or miserly manner.  ...This about sums up my opinion

They are fairly comfortable, and look great. The soles are flexible and a bit thin for rough terrain. I thought these would be good to wear to work. Unfortunately I end up walking across a lot of loose rocks. You can feel each and every rock through the soles. I understand that's not the terrain these were made for. On flat ground they are amazing. If I didn't have to walk across decorative rock these would be my go to for work shoes.  I am keeping these for those few occasions that we do dress up and go out. They are absolutely perfect for that.

评论概述: Very Cheaply Made, Impossible to get refund!
评论详情: Cheap shoes, thin "Leather" Super mis-represented!  Don't believe their return policy or their customer service.  Returned 2 days after receiving, shoes arrived in shrink wrap, very cheap.  Returned per their 30 day policy, used UPS I have proof of delivery and still have not received refund, but I do keep getting emails from Eva saying once their warehouse received them we will get refund.  The only logical explanation at this point is their warehouse is over run with every person returning this garbage product.  I'm not going to hold my breath on the refund but still now its the principal.  I guess the old adage applies here, if it seems to good to be true, it probably is.

Bought these for my daughters wedding. They fit as expected and were fairly comfortable. I immediately replaced the insoles with a better quality insole, now they are very comfortable! If they would include a quality insole these shoes would be fantastic. I did receive many compliments on how they looked. Overall I am very pleased, and will continue wearing these for work.
Very comfortable and lightweight, I don’t dislike anything.

评论概述: Make sure it's what you want before you buy
评论详情: While we did like these shoes, they weren't exactly what we wanted.  I'm used to not having to pay shipping going back and didn't think of it.  These would have to be shipped back to China, so we gave them away because shipping them back cost as much as the shoes themselves and we'd have nothing to show.  So make sure they are what you want and the size you need BEFORE your purchase these.

I have to dress up well for jobs occasionally, saw these and thought I’d give them a try. I’ve waited to review them untill I had a chance to wear them several times. I really like them. I wasn’t aware they were shipped to the US AFTER being ordered. The wait was a bit much, but the shoes are well worth it. Boss has complimented me on them several times.
